successSetPassword: Password change successful. Redirection to login page...
errorSetPasswordLater: Error while setting password. Try again later.
successRequest: Request successful. Check for mail. Redirection to login page...
errorResetPassword: Error while resetting password. Try again later.
errorSetPasswordBadToken: The given token is not valid.
errorSetPasswordUsedToken: The given Token was already used.
errorSetPasswordWeakPassword: The submitted password not fulfilled the requirements.
